name: CoinBattle
description:
This is a dual player game, in an old fashion keyboard sharing way where two players try to catch more coins than the other. You can also attack the opponent to steal some coins. Wins the one with more value!

The programing of this game took place in a Gamedev/Unity workshop with 11 grade students. The majority of the assets came from free sources and the artists are credit below:

CREDITS

Developed to a videogame workshop at: Escola Secundária Augusto Gomes

in collaboration with: Escola Superior de Arte e Design

DEVELOPED BY

Rui Caldas (HomeGameCoder)

CLASS TUTORS: Fernando Sousa, Miguel Malheiro, Raul Macedo

WORKSHOP ATTENDANTS: 11º L do Curso Profissional de Técnico de Gestão e Programação de Sistemas informáticos, 2021/22

ASSETS

Sprites

Simple Knight by Calciumtrice,

usable under Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 license.

Coins by Clint Bellanger,

for Liberated Pixel Art

Music

www.matthewpablo.com
